mapper.insert: insert into restaurant (res_name, res_number, res_score, res_loc, res_content,user_id,res_img,loc_name,res_kind) values(#{resName},#{resNumber}, 0, #{resLoc},#{resContent},#{userId},#{resImg},#{locName},#{resKind})
mapper.update: update restaurant set res_name=#{resName}, res_number=#{resNumber}, res_loc=#{resLoc}, res_content=#{resContent}, res_img=#{resImg}, loc_name=#{locName}, res_kind=#{resKind}, res_updatedate=sysdate where res_no=#{resNo}
mapper.select: select * from restaurant order by res_no desc
select * from restaurant where loc_name=#{locName} order by res_no desc
select * from (select * from restaurant order by res_score desc) where rownum <= 10
select * from (select * from restaurant order by res_score desc) where rownum <= 10 and loc_name=#{locName }
select * from (select * from restaurant order by res_no desc) where rownum <= 3
select res_name from restaurant where res_name like concat('%',concat(UPPER(#{resName}),'%')) or res_name like concat('%',concat(LOWER(#{resName}),'%'))
